sentences.sContent: He is titular head, and merely signs laws occasionally.
sentences.sCn: 他是名义上的首长，仅是偶尔签署法律而已。

synos.tran: 有名无实的；有头衔的；标题的

trans.tranCn: 有名无实的, 有资格的, 有头衔的
trans.tranOther: A titular job or position has a name that makes it seem important, although the person who has it is not really powerful
